::Hakibuscon::

	Hakibuscon woke up, and felt better than ever.  Finally, he got some rest
and healed up.  He decided to go to the weapon storage to get some new
weapons.  He looked at the weapons, and tried to decide which ones to take.
 He found a plasma rifle which looked in good shape, and he also took a
pistol.  He felt ready now.  But, he missed his state-of-the-art laser
sword.  Oh well, he was fine with what he had now, a plasma rifle, a
pistol, optic lasers and metallicarpal mini-missiles.  (Fact: Our finger
bones are called Metacarpal bones so for bots I made up Metallicarpals. 
Also, Hakibuscon can fire 4 of his mini-missiles because they only do half
as much as normal missiles) 

	Hakibuscon called Blackarachnia through his commlink, "Predacon leader, I
am requesting permission from you to go on a stealth mission at the
Alliance base."
